english.segment1: Time stand still. In this moment. Dawn arise. From nights keeping
english.segment2: All my love. Stored up treasure. Heart awake from your sleeping
english.segment3: And all I really want to say is I love you. And all I really want to do is be next to you
english.segment4: Here on the edge. Of what lies ahead. Ready to fall into you. Fall into you
english.segment5: I'm not afraid. Of change or of pain. Ready to fall into you. Fall into you
english.segment6: Searching heart. Search is over. Peace has proven you real. Guarded heart, Guard this love now. As faithfulness is revealed
english.segment7: And all I really want to say is I love you. And all I really want to do is be next to you
english.segment8: Here on the edge. Of what lies ahead. Ready to fall into you. Fall into you
english.segment9: I'm not afraid. Of change or of pain. Ready to fall into you. Fall into you.
